option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="8dp">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvConversations" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvEmpty" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:text="No conversations" android:visibility="gone"/>
</FrameLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<!-- Header --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/headerLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/primary_green" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvStepTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/step_title" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="@string/details_title" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvStepProgress" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/step_progress_text" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Progress Bar --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/progress_bar_background" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@color/primary_green" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="4" android:background="@color/light_gray" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Content --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/btnNext" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/headerLayout">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/select_milling_service" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<RadioGroup android:id="@+id/radioGroupMilling" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Milling for Fee Option --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cardMillingForFee" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="20dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rbMillingForFee" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:text="@string/currency_dollar" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/primary_green" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/milling_for_fee" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</RadioGroup>
<!-- Sack Count Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvSackLabel" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_number_of_sacks" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/sackCountLayout" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnMinus" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:text="@string/minus" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSackCount" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/sack_default_count" android:textSize="18sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnPlus" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:text="@string/plus" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Include existing service rates layout (reused) --> <include layout="@layout/servicerateslayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>
<!-- Next Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btnNext" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_margin="24dp" android:background="@drawable/button_primary" android:text="@string/next" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<!-- Header --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/headerLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/primary_green" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvStepTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/step_title" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="@string/details_title" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvStepProgress" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/step_progress_text" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Progress Bar --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="8dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:background="@drawable/progress_bar_background" android:orientation="horizontal">
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@color/primary_green" />
<View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="4" android:background="@color/light_gray" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Content --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/btnNext" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/headerLayout">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<RadioGroup android:id="@+id/radioGroupMilling" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- removed Milling for Fee CardView as requested -->
</RadioGroup>
<!-- Sack Count Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvSackLabel" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/label_number_of_sacks" android:textSize="16sp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/sackCountLayout" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnMinus" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:text="@string/minus" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSackCount" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/sack_default_count" android:textSize="18sp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnPlus" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:text="@string/plus" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Include existing service rates layout (reused) --> <include layout="@layout/servicerateslayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>
<!-- Next Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btnNext" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_margin="24dp" android:background="@drawable/button_primary" android:text="@string/next" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
